article: starting in the middle of february this year , the bangkok metropolitan administration -lrb- bma -rrb- will operate sightseeing buses on the old part of bangkok , popularly known as unk island , according to an official release of the government public relation department available here monday .
abstract: sightseeing buses to operate in bangkok
